name: Long Night (itch) (Max Sievert)
description:
Single player horror adventure game

Long Night

You play as a child looking for their parents.  You need to explore your house looking for clues as to where they went. However, there is a lurking presence following you around. Find all the clues and obtain the keys to continue through the house.

Sanity is your health. Stay in the light to keep your sanity up. Your flashlight will run out of battery and can only be charged by checkpoints.

Clues are scattered throughout the map. Bringing the clues back to their designated spot can reward you with the key to a new room.

Staying in a room for too long will attract the Monster. Keep on the move to stay away from the monster.
